    Career

    Research & Development and Government Incentives Consultant

    September 2015 – Current
    Deloitte Australia (Perth, Western Australia)

    I liaise with external clients to identify and claim eligible scientific research and development projects for the Australian Government R&D Tax Incentive. I work across a variety of industries, using my science and engineering background to engage with Australian leaders in innovation, create technical project descriptions, and identify costs.

    Debating Coach

    February 2015 - Present
    Methodist Ladies' College (Perth, Western Australia)

    I joined the College community in 2015, working primarily with middle years students. Since I joined the school, coaching students in persuasive speaking and guiding discussion of complex topics, teams in the state debating competition have seen great success - winning the state grand final for the first time since 1987. I have also introduced the school to a new, national virtual debating competition, and continue to co-ordinate students for further opportunities.

    Mentor

    June 2013 - December 2013
    New Hope Foundation (Melbourne, Western Australia)

    I ran homework clubs for refugee and migrant youths at primary and high schools in the outer Western suburbs of Melbourne. I was primarily responsible for classes for a set group of high school students, 2-3 times a week. This position included managing students with challenging behaviours, gaps in their schooling, and communication difficulties. I was also responsible for overseeing university psychology and teaching students who assisted me as a work placement.

    Library Stock Handler

    July 2014 – August 2015 (1 year 2 months)
    Westbooks (Perth, Western Australia)

    Westbooks provides library items to public libraries in Western Australia. The role included researching newly received stock, cataloguing new materials, reviewing outstanding orders & liaising with distributors.

    R&D Tax Professional

    November 2013 – July 2014
    KPMG Australia (Melbourne, Australia)

    Liaising with external clients to identify and claim eligible research and development projects for the Australian Government R&D Tax Incentive.

    Coach, Board Member and Adjudicator

    February 2011 – July 2014
    Debaters' Association of Victoria (Melbourne, Australia)

    Trained primary students through to adults in persuasive speaking and debating.

    Library Officer

    March 2010 – June 2010
    State Library of Western Australia (Perth, Western Australia)

    Provided customer service to clients including reference enquiries, bookshop sales, and IT assistance. I also assisted with management of state library network resources, including tracking and allocation of interlibrary loans, processing of external library requests, banking, switchboard management, & archive and fragile document supervision and handling.

    Motivational Speaker

    June 2009 – June 2010
    AFS Intercultural Programs (Perth, Western Australia)

    Primarily visited high schools around Western Australia, making presentations to groups of up to 2,000 people. This included creation of presentation materials, liaison with school contacts, and persuasive presentation of materials. I also sought out and assisted scholarship candidates throughout the application process, and publicised and assisted in administration of new scholarship initiatives.

    Farmhand & Nanny

    November 2009 – January 2010
    Koji Egg Co (Kojonup, Western Australia)

    N/A

    Research Officer

    January 2009 – January 2010
    Department of the Premier and Cabinet of WA (Perth, Western Australia)

    Provided support to offices of Members of State Parliament. This included research of political issues, liasing with constituents regarding their concerns and maintaining databases thereof, & updating physical filing mechanisms.

    Change Management Officer

    January 2009 – May 2009
    Maersk Drilling (Perth, Western Australia)

    This was a project contract to assist with setting up the initial technical change management system and progressing requests for a new rig.

    Library Officer

    November 2007 – January 2009
    Town of Victoria Park (Perth, Western Australia)

    Liaised with foreign language clients and dealt with cultural concerns.
